Package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http

Class HandlerStack

java.lang.Object
io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AutoCloseableService
io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.HandlerStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
VrapHttpClient, AutoCloseable
public class HandlerStack extends AutoCloseableService implements VrapHttpClient
The HandlerStack is used to execute the middlewares in order and transfer the request using the specified HttpHandler
